citations.narrative:
The microchip numbers for the 21 adult cats were not recorded on APHIS form 7005. Failure to record the tag, tattoo, or
microchip number for each cat makes it difficult to identify and keep track of animals. Licensee must ensure the microchip
numbers are recorded for each cat on APHIS form 7005 to help identify and keep track of animals. Correct by November
30, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(vi) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The microchip numbers for the 21 adult cats were not recorded on APHIS form 7005. Failure to record the tag, tattoo, or 
microchip number for each cat makes it difficult to identify and keep track of animals. Licensee must ensure the microchip 
numbers are recorded for each cat on APHIS form 7005 to help identify and keep track of animals. Correct by November 
30, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
